subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Robert Karlsson maintained a four-stroke lead after the third round of the Hong Kong Open with a four-under-par 66 that included his first bogey of the tournament.Karlsson had four birdies before a bogey on the par-four No. 9, and added a birdie at No. 14. He is at 16-under 194 at the Hong Kong Golf Club.Four strokes behind was Miguel Ángel Jiménez, the 2004 champion who also shot a 66 after bogeying the ninth.Mike Weir, a former Masters champion, shot a 67 to slip into a tie for seventh.
